title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.12 - Ring earnings of combatants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.12 - Ring earnings of combatants

State Regulations

No licensed professional boxer or mixed martial artist shall
actually receive less than fifty percent (50%) of his or her ring earnings
after all authorized purse deductions, unless otherwise directed or authorized
by the Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
209.12

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
